reviewText: TANKS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Game is an oldie but a goodie, command tanks, destroy other tanks from an RTS style of mechanics and over view though you can go into a tank itself and wreck some havoc! And if you're like me, you might even accidently" destroy your own tanks just for the hell of t."

reviewText: No controls on how to play, actually got into a game but did not know how to go inside my tank, I just looked at a map. I got this game for $1 so no loss, if it had better controls it might be worth getting for a dollar. It should be noted that you cna play this game on a website for no money though...
